discussion.blockquote: Requires: position is dereferenceable or equal to before_begin().
discussion.p: I believe what's actually intended is this:
discussion.blockquote: Requires: position is in the range [before_begin(), end()).
discussion.p: That is, when it's dereferenceable, position must point into *this, not just any forward_list object.
discussion.blockquote: Robert suggested alternate proposed wording which had large support.

blockquote.p: Walter: "position is before_begin() or a dereferenceable": add "is" after the "or"
With that minor update, Recommend Tentatively Ready.

resolution.p: Change the Requires clauses , p21, p24, p26, p29, and, , p39, p43, p47 as follows:
resolution.blockquote: Requires: position is before_begin() or is a dereferenceable iterator in the range [begin(), end()) or equal to before_begin(). ...
